General.Name: Dyandra Media International PT
General.Description: PT Dyandra Media International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides integrated event solutions in Indonesia. The company organizes events and exhibitions; and provides supporting events. It also operates venues and halls, including convention and exhibition halls; and involved in the hotel business. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dyandra Media International Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Teletransmedia.
General.Address: Jl. Johar No. 9, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10310

2.Name: Ms. Ria  Sari
2.Title: Head of the Internal Audit Unit
